# cTMed

Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan 2026-01-11

## Description

Computes effect sizes, standard errors, and confidence intervals for
total, direct, and indirect effects in continuous-time mediation models
as described in Pesigan, Russell, and Chow (2025:
<https://doi.org/10.1037/met0000779>).

## Author-Accepted Manuscript

See
<https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/blob/main/.setup/latex/manCTMed-manuscript.Rtex>
for the latex file of the manuscript. See
<https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/blob/latex/manCTMed-manuscript.pdf>
for the compiled PDF.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `cTMed` from
[GitHub](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed) with:

``` r

if (!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jeksterslab/cTMed")
```

## Documentation

See [GitHub Pages](https://jeksterslab.github.io/cTMed/index.html) for
package documentation.

## Citation

To cite `cTMed` in publications, please cite Pesigan et al.Â (2025).

## References

Pesigan, I. J. A., Russell, M. A., & Chow, S.-M. (2025). Inferences and
effect sizes for direct, indirect, and total effects in continuous-time
mediation models. *Psychological Methods*.
<https://doi.org/10.1037/met0000779>

R Core Team. (2025). *R: A language and environment for statistical
computing*. R Foundation for Statistical Computing.
<https://www.R-project.org/>

# Package index

## Monte Carlo Method

- [`MCBeta()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/MCBeta.md)
  : Monte Carlo Sampling Distribution for the Elements of the Matrix of
  Lagged Coefficients Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time
  Intervals
- [`MCBetaStd()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/MCBetaStd.md)
  : Monte Carlo Sampling Distribution for the Elements of the
  Standardized Matrix of Lagged Coefficients Over a Specific Time
  Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`MCIndirectCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/MCIndirectCentral.md)
  : Monte Carlo Sampling Distribution of Indirect Effect Centrality Over
  a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`MCMed()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/MCMed.md) :
  Monte Carlo Sampling Distribution of Total, Direct, and Indirect
  Effects of X on Y Through M Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range
  of Time Intervals
- [`MCMedStd()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/MCMedStd.md)
  : Monte Carlo Sampling Distribution of Standardized Total, Direct, and
  Indirect Effects of X on Y Through M Over a Specific Time Interval or
  a Range of Time Intervals
- [`MCPhi()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/MCPhi.md) :
  Generate Random Drift Matrices Using the Monte Carlo Method
- [`MCPhiSigma()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/MCPhiSigma.md)
  : Generate Random Drift Matrices and Process Noise Covariance Matrices
  Using the Monte Carlo Method
- [`MCTotalCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/MCTotalCentral.md)
  : Monte Carlo Sampling Distribution of Total Effect Centrality Over a
  Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals

## Delta Method

- [`DeltaBeta()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/DeltaBeta.md)
  : Delta Method Sampling Variance-Covariance Matrix for the Elements of
  the Matrix of Lagged Coefficients Over a Specific Time Interval or a
  Range of Time Intervals
- [`DeltaBetaStd()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/DeltaBetaStd.md)
  : Delta Method Sampling Variance-Covariance Matrix for the Elements of
  the Standardized Matrix of Lagged Coefficients Over a Specific Time
  Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`DeltaIndirectCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/DeltaIndirectCentral.md)
  : Delta Method Sampling Variance-Covariance Matrix for the Indirect
  Effect Centrality Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time
  Intervals
- [`DeltaMed()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/DeltaMed.md)
  : Delta Method Sampling Variance-Covariance Matrix for the Total,
  Direct, and Indirect Effects of X on Y Through M Over a Specific Time
  Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`DeltaMedStd()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/DeltaMedStd.md)
  : Delta Method Sampling Variance-Covariance Matrix for the
  Standardized Total, Direct, and Indirect Effects of X on Y Through M
  Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`DeltaTotalCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/DeltaTotalCentral.md)
  : Delta Method Sampling Variance-Covariance Matrix for the Total
  Effect Centrality Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time
  Intervals

## Posterior

- [`PosteriorBeta()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/PosteriorBeta.md)
  : Posterior Sampling Distribution for the Elements of the Matrix of
  Lagged Coefficients Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time
  Intervals
- [`PosteriorIndirectCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/PosteriorIndirectCentral.md)
  : Posterior Distribution of the Indirect Effect Centrality Over a
  Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`PosteriorMed()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/PosteriorMed.md)
  : Posterior Distribution of Total, Direct, and Indirect Effects of X
  on Y Through M Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time
  Intervals
- [`PosteriorTotalCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/PosteriorTotalCentral.md)
  : Posterior Distribution of the Total Effect Centrality Over a
  Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals

## Bootstrap

- [`BootBeta()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/BootBeta.md)
  : Bootstrap Sampling Distribution for the Elements of the Matrix of
  Lagged Coefficients Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time
  Intervals
- [`BootBetaStd()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/BootBetaStd.md)
  : Bootstrap Sampling Distribution for the Elements of the Standardized
  Matrix of Lagged Coefficients Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range
  of Time Intervals
- [`BootIndirectCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/BootIndirectCentral.md)
  : Bootstrap Sampling Distribution for the Indirect Effect Centrality
  Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`BootMed()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/BootMed.md)
  : Bootstrap Sampling Distribution of Total, Direct, and Indirect
  Effects of X on Y Through M Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range
  of Time Intervals
- [`BootMedStd()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/BootMedStd.md)
  : Bootstrap Sampling Distribution of Standardized Total, Direct, and
  Indirect Effects of X on Y Through M Over a Specific Time Interval or
  a Range of Time Intervals
- [`BootTotalCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/BootTotalCentral.md)
  : Bootstrap Sampling Distribution for the Total Effect Centrality Over
  a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals

## Mediation

- [`BootBeta()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/BootBeta.md)
  : Bootstrap Sampling Distribution for the Elements of the Matrix of
  Lagged Coefficients Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time
  Intervals
- [`BootBetaStd()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/BootBetaStd.md)
  : Bootstrap Sampling Distribution for the Elements of the Standardized
  Matrix of Lagged Coefficients Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range
  of Time Intervals
- [`BootMed()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/BootMed.md)
  : Bootstrap Sampling Distribution of Total, Direct, and Indirect
  Effects of X on Y Through M Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range
  of Time Intervals
- [`BootMedStd()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/BootMedStd.md)
  : Bootstrap Sampling Distribution of Standardized Total, Direct, and
  Indirect Effects of X on Y Through M Over a Specific Time Interval or
  a Range of Time Intervals
- [`DeltaMed()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/DeltaMed.md)
  : Delta Method Sampling Variance-Covariance Matrix for the Total,
  Direct, and Indirect Effects of X on Y Through M Over a Specific Time
  Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`DeltaMedStd()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/DeltaMedStd.md)
  : Delta Method Sampling Variance-Covariance Matrix for the
  Standardized Total, Direct, and Indirect Effects of X on Y Through M
  Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`MCMed()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/MCMed.md) :
  Monte Carlo Sampling Distribution of Total, Direct, and Indirect
  Effects of X on Y Through M Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range
  of Time Intervals
- [`MCMedStd()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/MCMedStd.md)
  : Monte Carlo Sampling Distribution of Standardized Total, Direct, and
  Indirect Effects of X on Y Through M Over a Specific Time Interval or
  a Range of Time Intervals
- [`Med()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/Med.md) :
  Total, Direct, and Indirect Effects of X on Y Through M Over a
  Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`MedStd()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/MedStd.md)
  : Standardized Total, Direct, and Indirect Effects of X on Y Through M
  Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`PosteriorMed()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/PosteriorMed.md)
  : Posterior Distribution of Total, Direct, and Indirect Effects of X
  on Y Through M Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time
  Intervals
- [`Trajectory()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/Trajectory.md)
  : Simulate Trajectories of Variables

## Network Centrality

- [`BootIndirectCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/BootIndirectCentral.md)
  : Bootstrap Sampling Distribution for the Indirect Effect Centrality
  Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`BootTotalCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/BootTotalCentral.md)
  : Bootstrap Sampling Distribution for the Total Effect Centrality Over
  a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`DeltaIndirectCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/DeltaIndirectCentral.md)
  : Delta Method Sampling Variance-Covariance Matrix for the Indirect
  Effect Centrality Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time
  Intervals
- [`DeltaTotalCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/DeltaTotalCentral.md)
  : Delta Method Sampling Variance-Covariance Matrix for the Total
  Effect Centrality Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time
  Intervals
- [`IndirectCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/IndirectCentral.md)
  : Indirect Effect Centrality
- [`MCIndirectCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/MCIndirectCentral.md)
  : Monte Carlo Sampling Distribution of Indirect Effect Centrality Over
  a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`MCTotalCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/MCTotalCentral.md)
  : Monte Carlo Sampling Distribution of Total Effect Centrality Over a
  Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`PosteriorIndirectCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/PosteriorIndirectCentral.md)
  : Posterior Distribution of the Indirect Effect Centrality Over a
  Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`PosteriorTotalCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/PosteriorTotalCentral.md)
  : Posterior Distribution of the Total Effect Centrality Over a
  Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`TotalCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/TotalCentral.md)
  : Total Effect Centrality

## Effects

- [`Direct()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/Direct.md)
  : Direct Effect of X on Y Over a Specific Time Interval
- [`DirectStd()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/DirectStd.md)
  : Standardized Direct Effect of X on Y Over a Specific Time Interval
- [`Indirect()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/Indirect.md)
  : Indirect Effect of X on Y Through M Over a Specific Time Interval
- [`IndirectCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/IndirectCentral.md)
  : Indirect Effect Centrality
- [`IndirectStd()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/IndirectStd.md)
  : Standardized Indirect Effect of X on Y Through M Over a Specific
  Time Interval
- [`Med()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/Med.md) :
  Total, Direct, and Indirect Effects of X on Y Through M Over a
  Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`MedStd()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/MedStd.md)
  : Standardized Total, Direct, and Indirect Effects of X on Y Through M
  Over a Specific Time Interval or a Range of Time Intervals
- [`Total()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/Total.md) :
  Total Effect Matrix Over a Specific Time Interval
- [`TotalCentral()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/TotalCentral.md)
  : Total Effect Centrality
- [`TotalStd()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/TotalStd.md)
  : Standardized Total Effect Matrix Over a Specific Time Interval
- [`Trajectory()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/Trajectory.md)
  : Simulate Trajectories of Variables

## Methods

- [`confint(`*`<ctmedboot>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/confint.ctmedboot.md)
  : Bootstrap Method Confidence Intervals

- [`confint(`*`<ctmeddelta>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/confint.ctmeddelta.md)
  : Delta Method Confidence Intervals

- [`confint(`*`<ctmedmc>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/confint.ctmedmc.md)
  : Monte Carlo Method Confidence Intervals

- [`plot(`*`<ctmedboot>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/plot.ctmedboot.md)
  :

  Plot Method for an Object of Class `ctmedboot`

- [`plot(`*`<ctmeddelta>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/plot.ctmeddelta.md)
  :

  Plot Method for an Object of Class `ctmeddelta`

- [`plot(`*`<ctmedmc>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/plot.ctmedmc.md)
  :

  Plot Method for an Object of Class `ctmedmc`

- [`plot(`*`<ctmedmed>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/plot.ctmedmed.md)
  :

  Plot Method for an Object of Class `ctmedmed`

- [`plot(`*`<ctmedtraj>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/plot.ctmedtraj.md)
  :

  Plot Method for an Object of Class `ctmedtraj`

- [`print(`*`<ctmedboot>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/print.ctmedboot.md)
  :

  Print Method for Object of Class `ctmedboot`

- [`print(`*`<ctmeddelta>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/print.ctmeddelta.md)
  :

  Print Method for Object of Class `ctmeddelta`

- [`print(`*`<ctmedeffect>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/print.ctmedeffect.md)
  :

  Print Method for Object of Class `ctmedeffect`

- [`print(`*`<ctmedmc>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/print.ctmedmc.md)
  :

  Print Method for Object of Class `ctmedmc`

- [`print(`*`<ctmedmcphi>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/print.ctmedmcphi.md)
  :

  Print Method for Object of Class `ctmedmcphi`

- [`print(`*`<ctmedmed>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/print.ctmedmed.md)
  :

  Print Method for Object of Class `ctmedmed`

- [`print(`*`<ctmedtraj>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/print.ctmedtraj.md)
  :

  Print Method for Object of Class `ctmedtraj`

- [`summary(`*`<ctmedboot>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/summary.ctmedboot.md)
  :

  Summary Method for an Object of Class `ctmedboot`

- [`summary(`*`<ctmeddelta>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/summary.ctmeddelta.md)
  :

  Summary Method for an Object of Class `ctmeddelta`

- [`summary(`*`<ctmedmc>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/summary.ctmedmc.md)
  :

  Summary Method for an Object of Class `ctmedmc`

- [`summary(`*`<ctmedmed>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/summary.ctmedmed.md)
  :

  Summary Method for an Object of Class `ctmedmed`

- [`summary(`*`<ctmedposteriorphi>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/summary.ctmedposteriorphi.md)
  :

  Summary Method for Object of Class `ctmedposteriorphi`

- [`summary(`*`<ctmedtraj>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/reference/summary.ctmedtraj.md)
  :

  Summary Method for an Object of Class `ctmedtraj`

# Articles

### Fitting Continuous-Time Vector Autoregressive Models

- [Fit the Continuous-Time Vector Autoregressive Model Using the dynr
  Package](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/articles/fit-ct-var-dynr.md):
- [Fit the Continuous-Time Vector Autoregressive Model Using the OpenMx
  Package](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/articles/fit-ct-var-mx.md):

### Confidence Intervals for Continuous-Time Mediation Models

- [Total, Direct, and Indirect Effects in Continuous-Time Mediation
  Model](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/articles/med.md):
- [Standardized Total, Direct, and Indirect Effects in Continuous-Time
  Mediation
  Model](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/articles/med-std.md):

### Confidence Intervals for Continuous-Time Mediation Models (Parametric Bootstrap)

- [Total, Direct, and Indirect Effects in Continuous-Time Mediation
  Model
  (Bootstrap)](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/articles/med-boot.md):

### Session Information

- [cTMed:
  Session](https://github.com/jeksterslab/cTMed/articles/session.md):
